#include "client.h"
#include "server.h"

#include "../shardmaster/client.h" 

namespace janus {

int ShardKvClient::Op(function<int(uint32_t*)> func) {
  uint64_t t1 = Time::now();
  while (true) {
    Log_info("OP LeaderId : %d and ClientID : %d", leader_idx_, cli_id_);
    uint64_t t2 = Time::now();
    if (t2 - t1 > 10000000) {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
    uint32_t ret = 0;
    int r1; 
    r1 = func(&ret);
    if (r1 == ETIMEDOUT || ret == KV_TIMEOUT) {
      leader_idx_ = (leader_idx_+1) % 20;
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
    if (ret == KV_SUCCESS) {
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    if (ret == KV_NOTLEADER) {
      Log_info("OP in Not Leader");
      leader_idx_ = (leader_idx_+1) % 20;
    }
  }

}

int ShardKvClient::Put(const string& k, const string& v) {


  auto p = (ShardMasterProxy*)commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(0);
  ShardConfig config;
  uint32_t ret;
  p->Query(-1, &ret, &config);
  uint32_t shard_id = Key2Shard(k);
  uint32_t g_id = config.shard_group_map_[shard_id];
  Log_info("Calling PUT from Client for ShardID : %d and GroupID : %d", shard_id, g_id);
  for(auto it : config.shard_group_map_){
    Log_info("Shard Id %d and Grp Id : %d", it.first, it.second);
  }
  for(auto it : config.group_servers_map_){
    Log_info("Grp Id : %d", it.first);
    for(auto mp : it.second){
      Log_info(" --- Site Id : %d", mp);
    }
  }
  leader_idx_ = *std::min_element(config.group_servers_map_[g_id].begin(), config.group_servers_map_[g_id].end());
  Log_info("PUT LeaderId : %d and ClientID : %d", leader_idx_, cli_id_);
  return Op([&](uint32_t* r)->int{
    return Proxy(leader_idx_).Put(GetNextOpId(), k, v, r);
  });
}

ShardKvProxy& ShardKvClient::Proxy(siteid_t site_id) {
  verify(commo_);
  auto p = (ShardKvProxy*)commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(site_id);
  return *p; 
}

int ShardKvClient::Append(const string& k, const string& v) {


  auto p = (ShardMasterProxy*)commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(0);
  ShardConfig config;
  uint32_t ret;
  p->Query(-1, &ret, &config);
  uint32_t shard_id = Key2Shard(k);
  uint32_t g_id = config.shard_group_map_[shard_id];
  leader_idx_ = *std::min_element(config.group_servers_map_[g_id].begin(), config.group_servers_map_[g_id].end());
  return Op([&](uint32_t* r)->int{


    return Proxy(leader_idx_).Append(GetNextOpId(), k, v, r);
  });
}

int ShardKvClient::Get(const string& k, string* v) {
  auto p = (ShardMasterProxy*)commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(0);


  ShardConfig config;
  uint32_t ret;
  p->Query(-1, &ret, &config);
  uint32_t shard_id = Key2Shard(k);
  uint32_t g_id = config.shard_group_map_[shard_id];
  leader_idx_ = *std::min_element(config.group_servers_map_[g_id].begin(), config.group_servers_map_[g_id].end());
  return Op([&](uint32_t* r)->int{
    return Proxy(leader_idx_).Get(GetNextOpId(), k, r, v);
  });
}

} // namesapce janus;
